analysis.functional_summary: This JCL script is used to compile and link-edit a BMS map named BNK1CDM. It utilizes a procedure named MAPGEN and specifies the member BNK1CDM with a relocation mode of ANY. The output is directed to a specified location.
data_flow: Step 1: Include default settings from DEFAULT member
Step 2: Execute MAPGEN procedure with specified parameters
Step 3: Output the compiled and link-edited map
state_changes: Creation of compiled and link-edited BMS map
side_effects: File I/O operations for compiling and link-editing
interface_points: JCLLIB ORDER directive for library access
INCLUDE MEMBER directive for default settings
modernization_notes: Consider refactoring JCL to use modern build tools
analysis.analysis_notes: The JCL script is straightforward, primarily serving as a build script for a specific BMS map. It relies on external procedures and libraries for its operations.
